meanings.definition: A group of seven isomeric hydrocarbons with the formula C7H16.
meanings.sent1: Heptanes are used as a fuel additive in some gasoline blends.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician studied the properties of heptanes in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The heptanes at the party were always the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like heptanes, branching out in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The smell of heptanes lingered in the air, reminding him of the chemistry lab.
